content.text:
# 21st Japan Film Professional Awards

The  was the 21st edition of the Japan Film Professional Awards. Films of 2011 which had not already won a major domestic film award were eligible. The ceremony took place on May 26, 2012 at Theatre Shinjuku in Tokyo.
Awards
*Best Film:
*Best Director: Amir Naderi (Cut)
*Best Actress: Nana Eikura (Tokyo Park, Antoki no Inochi)
*Best Actor: Hidetoshi Nishijima (Cut)
*Best New Director:  (Moteki)
*Best New Director: Kōji Maeda ()
*Special: Yoshinori Chiba (For production of Guilty of Romance.)
*Best Distinguished Service: Mako Midori (For ' performance and her longtime work.)
